short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension for the social HN site. It allows you to store/share/follow/find the links you like on Hacker News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How many times you have seen interesting articles or products on Hacker News (http://news.ycombinator.com) and not being able to find then weeks later?

We got a solution for you. It's a browser extension which unobtrusively tracks your up votes. You won't ever notice it!
